Covert Skins.name: AK-47 | X-Ray
Covert Skins.desc: A custom painted AK-47 showing its internals with an X-Ray.
Covert Skins.lore: When all is revealed you may not like what you see...

Classified Skins.name: AWP | Silk Tiger
Classified Skins.desc: A hydrographic tiger pattern has been applied over a blue base.
Classified Skins.lore: A national treasureâ€”the tiger, not the AWP

Classified Skins.name: MAC-10 | Hot Snakes
Classified Skins.desc: It has been custom painted with a bronze snakeskin pattern and a coiled snake beneath the wire form butt.
Classified Skins.lore: The hissing is bullets flying past you

Restricted Skins.name: Glock-18 | Franklin
Restricted Skins.desc: It has been painted using a hydrographic of American hundred-dollar bills.

Restricted Skins.name: Galil AR | Phoenix Blacklight
Restricted Skins.desc: A multicolored pattern of various Phoenix Connexion graffiti has been applied.

Restricted Skins.name: SG 553 | Hypnotic
Restricted Skins.desc: It has been painted with a pearl base coat, then spray-painted black through a stencil in a graphic pattern.
Restricted Skins.lore: You're not getting sleepy, you're passing out from blood loss

Mil-Spec Skins.name: P90 | Tiger Pit
Mil-Spec Skins.desc: A brown and tan hydrographic tiger pattern has been applied over a black base.

Mil-Spec Skins.name: Desert Eagle | Night Heist
Mil-Spec Skins.desc: Its base has been painted with a purple anodized map pattern. It looks like someone has drawn on top of the map since it was first applied.
Mil-Spec Skins.lore: Planning is one thing, executing is another

Mil-Spec Skins.name: P250 | Bengal Tiger
Mil-Spec Skins.desc: It has been painted using a tiger stripe hydrographic.

Mil-Spec Skins.name: Negev | Phoenix Stencil
Mil-Spec Skins.desc: A multicolored pattern of various Phoenix Connexion graffiti has been applied.

Industrial Grade Skins.name: Nova | Rust Coat
Industrial Grade Skins.desc: It is still perfectly operational although the exterior surfaces have rusted.
Industrial Grade Skins.lore: Some people don't need to hide how dirty their deeds are

Industrial Grade Skins.name: R8 Revolver | Phoenix Marker
Industrial Grade Skins.desc: A multicolored pattern of various Phoenix Connexion graffiti has been applied.

Industrial Grade Skins.name: UMP-45 | Houndstooth
Industrial Grade Skins.desc: A brown houndstooth hydrographic pattern has been applied.
Industrial Grade Skins.lore: Equip for the role you want, not the role you have

Industrial Grade Skins.name: MP7 | Vault Heist
Industrial Grade Skins.desc: Its base has been painted with a grey anodized map pattern. It looks like someone has drawn on top of the map since it was first applied.
Industrial Grade Skins.lore: Planning is one thing, executing is another

Consumer Grade Skins.name: Dual Berettas | Heist
Consumer Grade Skins.desc: Its base has been painted with a beige anodized map pattern. It looks like someone has drawn on top of the map since it was first applied.
Consumer Grade Skins.lore: Planning is one thing, executing is another

Consumer Grade Skins.name: Sawed-Off | Clay Ambush
Consumer Grade Skins.desc: A brown and tan hydrographic tiger pattern has been applied.
Consumer Grade Skins.lore: Normally solo predators, they'll make an exception for you

Consumer Grade Skins.name: M249 | Predator
Consumer Grade Skins.desc: It has been spray-painted in a zebra stripe pattern.

Consumer Grade Skins.name: Tec-9 | Phoenix Chalk
Consumer Grade Skins.desc: A multicolored pattern of various Phoenix Connexion graffiti has been applied.
Consumer Grade Skins.lore: "You are stupid to think you will win!"

Consumer Grade Skins.name: PP-Bizon | Death Rattle
Consumer Grade Skins.desc: It has been painted with a snakeskin patterned hydrographic.
Consumer Grade Skins.lore: I know you don't believe in the cause...and when I expose you, Valeria will have your head - The Shield and The Serpent Part 1
